1.name: Attack (All Troops)
1.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

2.name: Superior Tools
2.text: Increases gathering speed of all troops by ${1}%

3.name: Health (All Troops)
3.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

4.name: Marionette
4.text: Reduces damage taken from watchtowers by ${1}% when attacking other cities

5.name: Nowhere To Turn
5.text: When this commander is serving as garrison commander, grants an additional ${1} rage everytime the city is attacked

6.name: Attack (All Troops)
6.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

7.name: City Guardian
7.text: Increases watchtower attack by ${1}% when this commander is serving as garrison commander

8.name: Insight
8.text: Reduces action point cost to attack barbarians and other neutral units by ${1}

9.name: Defense (All Troops)
9.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

10.name: Buckler Shield
10.text: When attacking other governors' cities, decreases the number of units that die in battle by ${1}% (these units will instead be severely wounded and sent to the hospital)

11.name: March Speed (All Troops)
11.text: Increases the march speed of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

12.name: Attack (All Troops)
12.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

13.name: Defense (All Troops)
13.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

14.name: Defense (All Troops)
14.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

15.name: King's Guard
15.text: Increases garrison attack, defense, and health by ${1}% when this commander is serving as garrison commander

16.name: Health (All Troops)
16.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

17.name: Meteor Shower
17.text: Increases damage dealt to the garrison by ${1}% when attacking other cities

18.name: Turn Of Fate
18.text: When troops led by this commander enter battle, randomly grants all units one of the following buffs for the next 5 seconds: Attack +${1}%, Defense -${1}%, Damage Dealt +${1}% or March Speed -${1}%
